casebody.head_matter:
402 A.2d 661
BECKWITH MACHINERY COMPANY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee.

Decided June 22, 1979.
Edward T. Baker, Harrisburg, for appellant.

Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
